name: FSF Ship Design
desc: A higher level implement of ship-wide gravity field, the shell is designed to receive or send force to a nearby friendly ship. A fleet purely made of FSF ships can swiftly swap between different formations

name: Missile Platform
desc:
A integrated missile factory has taken all empty space, at the cost of max ammo, to continuously produce ammo. This applies to all missile weapons mounted on missile or composite slot.

desc:
The big open deck in the central of this ship makes it possible to deploy more fighters in a wing, but doubling the work for a single LPC chip dropped its performance a little bit

Fine-tuned control chip accelerates every movement related to weapon cycling, only ships pre-built with above-average steel can long-term stand its side effects

name: Strafe
desc:
This ship slowly recovers strafe energy. Whenever a large weapon is in cooldown, consume strafe energy to eliminate its cooldown remaining

Fully recharge strafe energy takes %s seconds, when fully charged it can eliminate %s seconds of cooldown, after elimination the shortest fire interval is %s

If this ship's shipsystem is out of charge, immediately consume %s of strafe energy to get a charge.

Each time this ship uses shipsystem, fires several low power built-in missiles to distract enemy

name: Pre-planted Reactive Armor
desc:
Planted explosive reactive armors under main armor belt, response to high damage on hit

name: Elite Ship
desc:
This modification aimed to maximize the defense of ship, including a total overhaul to all mechanism parts, using micro drones to detect and fix every small leak within pipelines, and replacing main armor belt with better material.

Besides ordinary improvement, a backup overload respond is installed, a disposal drone will hold a ship-size shield till the ship recovers.

name: Emergency Reconstruct
desc: Inspired by an automated ship design, a whole set of scaffold is put into compressed phase space. Once the ship receives a lethal damage, it initiates a emergency reconstruction progress to fully restore its hullpoints and armor
